title: Bunch of cannot find module errors from react-dom
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**
Bug

**What is the current behavior?**
I didn't used any version specific features, but after react16, my react module failed to transpile with these errors:

```bash
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactCurrentOwner' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactComponentTreeHook' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactCurrentOwner' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactComponentTreeHook' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactComponentTreeHook' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactCurrentOwner' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/React' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/getNextDebugID' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactComponentTreeHook' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactCurrentOwner' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/React' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactCurrentOwner' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/React' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactComponentTreeHook' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactComponentTreeHook' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/React' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactComponentTreeHook' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
Error: Cannot find module 'react/lib/ReactCurrentOwner' from 'F:\dev\react\react-multimedia-capture-example\node_modules\react-dom\lib'
```

You can reproduce this by learn this example with React 16(currently used react 15, so you have to upgrade): https://github.com/rico345100/react-multimedia-capture-example

**If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce and if possible a minimal demo of the problem via https://jsfiddle.net or similar (template for React 16: https://jsfiddle.net/Luktwrdm/, template for React 15: https://jsfiddle.net/hmbg7e9w/).**


**Which versions of React, and which browser / OS are affected by this issue? Did this work in previous versions of React?**

react@16.1.0
react-dom@15.6.2

Tested on Windows 10 with Chrome browser, but browsers aren't related, so meaningless. And yes, it worked before react 16 :)
